translation.en: [man] This is where it's at.
translation.it: È da qui che viene.

translation.en: -It's New York City. -[car horn honking]
translation.it: Da New York.

translation.en: Street basketball.
translation.it: Il basket di strada.

translation.en: This is our culture.
translation.it: È la nostra cultura.

translation.en: This is what we do, B. This is our job.
translation.it: Questo è ciò che facciamo. È il nostro lavoro.

translation.en: Yo, back in the day, it was like a big block party.
translation.it: Un tempo, era come una grande festa di quartiere.

translation.en: [man] The atmosphere, the energy.
translation.it: L'atmosfera, l'energia.

translation.en: It was just special.
translation.it: Era speciale.

translation.en: [announcer] It's jam-packed out here.
translation.it: Qui è gremito.

translation.en: The players are putting on a show, and the crowds are loving it.
translation.it: I giocatori danno spettacolo e la folla lo adora.

translation.en: [man] But AND1, they just took it to another level.
translation.it: Ma AND1 portò tutto a un altro livello.

translation.en: [announcer] AND1 basketball is sweeping the nation,
translation.it: Il basketball di AND1 spopola nella nazione

translation.en: becoming one of the biggest basketball brands.
translation.it: e diventa uno dei più grandi marchi del basket.

translation.en: [man] Tokyo, Japan. Venezuela. Brazil.
translation.it: Tokyo, Giappone. Venezuela. Brasile.

translation.en: You know, it was pandemonium.
translation.it: Era un pandemonio.

translation.en: [announcer] The competition is heating up.
translation.it: La gara si sta scaldando.

translation.en: AND1's newest sneakers are jumping off the shelves.
translation.it: Le nuove sneaker di AND1 vanno a ruba.

translation.en: [reporter] The line is not down the block. It is the block.
translation.it: La fila non è in fondo all'isolato. È l'isolato.

translation.en: [man] AND1? They had the best ballplayers in street basketball.
translation.it: AND1? Avevano i migliori giocatori del basket di strada.

translation.en: And the best players get the best names. Like Skip 2 My Lou.
translation.it: E i migliori hanno i nomi migliori. Come Skip 2 My Lou.

translation.en: [man] Shane. The Dribbling Machine.
translation.it: Shane. The Dribbling Machine.

translation.en: [announcer] Get your Superman on, Shane!
translation.it: Fai il Superman, Shane!

translation.en: [man] We talking about Hot to the Sauce.
translation.it: Parliamo di Hot Sauce.

translation.en: We talking about The Professor.
translation.it: Parliamo del Professore.

translation.en: [reporter] AND1 is taking on the titans of the industry
translation.it: AND1 sta sfidando i titani dell'industria

translation.en: with no plans of backing down.
translation.it: e non si tira indietro.

translation.en: [man] A lot of people today say, "Whatever happened to AND1?"
translation.it: Molti si chiedono oggi: "Cosa successe ad AND1?"

translation.en: I don't know what happened to it. And I was a part of it.
translation.it: Non lo so neanche io. E ne facevo parte.

translation.en: [man] I could never have started a business without my education at Wharton,
translation.it: Non avrei combinato niente senza gli studi alla Wharton,

translation.en: but after, like, the second day there,
translation.it: ma dopo il secondo giorno là,

translation.en: a couple things became pretty evident to me.
translation.it: un paio di cose divennero evidenti.

translation.en: All my classmates were totally focused on what they wanted to do,
translation.it: I miei compagni erano concentrati sui loro obiettivi

translation.en: and I had no idea.
translation.it: e io per niente.

translation.en: I had probably spent four to eight hours hooping
translation.it: Passavo dalle quattro alle otto ore a giocare a basket

translation.en: for every hour that I spent studying.
translation.it: per ogni ora di studio.

translation.en: [Seth] That summer, I did a free internship in investment banking.
translation.it: Quell'estate feci uno stage gratuito in investment banking.

translation.en: I was like, "This sucks. I'm not doing this."
translation.it: Pensai: "Che orrore. Non è per me.

translation.en: "I wanna do something that I love."
translation.it: Voglio fare qualcosa che amo.

translation.en: "If every day I get to wake up thinking about basketball,
translation.it: Se ogni giorno mi svegliassi pensando al basket,

translation.en: that will be a great day."
translation.it: sarebbe un gran giorno".

translation.en: That was the genesis to go start my own business.
translation.it: Così decisi di mettermi in proprio.

translation.en: I know the limitations of my abilities.
translation.it: Conosco bene i miei limiti.

translation.en: I was like, "There's no shot I can do this by myself."
translation.it: Mi dissi: "Non posso farcela da solo.

translation.en: "I gotta find a partner."
translation.it: Mi serve un socio".

translation.en: [man] Seth and I met each other in seventh grade.
translation.it: Io e Seth ci conoscevamo dalla seconda media.

translation.en: He came to me in college with this idea. So I said, "Yes,"
translation.it: Mi propose l'idea all'università. Accettai. È divertente lavorare col tuo migliore amico.

translation.en: 'cause it'll be a lot more fun to do any business with your best friend.
translation.it: Accettai. È divertente lavorare col tuo migliore amico.

translation.en: Seth talked about this young guy that he met while he was playing ball
translation.it: Seth parlò di questo ragazzino che aveva conosciuto giocando a basket

translation.en: and that I had to meet Tom.
translation.it: e disse che dovevo incontrare Tom.

translation.en: [Seth] When you play ball with somebody, you learn a lot about them really quickly.
translation.it: Quando giochi a basket con qualcuno, impari a conoscerlo in fretta.

translation.en: Tom has a 3.96 GPA at Wharton undergrad.
translation.it: Tom aveva quasi il massimo dei voti alla Wharton.

translation.en: I'm like, "How's that possible?"
translation.it: Mi dico: "Com'è possibile?

translation.en: "Like, the dude's playing basketball seven hours a day."
translation.it: Quello gioca a basket sette ore al giorno".

translation.en: And he said, "Just so you're aware, Tom's kind of a strange cat."
translation.it: Disse: "Sappi che Tom è un tipo un po' strano".

translation.en: He's, like, you know, looking down, not making eye contact, talking real low.
translation.it: Guarda in basso, non guarda negli occhi, parla a bassa voce. COFONDATORE DI AND1

translation.en: But Tom was brilliant. And he was really the genius behind AND1.
translation.it: Ma Tom era geniale. Ed era davvero il genio dietro AND1.

translation.en: [Tom] I grew up in small towns in New England.
translation.it: Sono cresciuto in cittadine del New England.

translation.en: We moved, like, three times.
translation.it: Ci trasferimmo tre volte.

translation.en: I was a shy, quiet kid,
translation.it: Ero un ragazzo timido

translation.en: and basketball was the thing that let me connect with people.
translation.it: e il basket era ciò che mi connetteva alle persone.

translation.en: [Seth] So, I talked to Tom, and I'm like,
translation.it: Parlai con Tom e gli dissi:

translation.en: "Yo, man. Um, you might be interested in pursuing a basketball business?" "What are you doing next year?"
translation.it: "Ti interessa il business del basket? Che fai l'anno prossimo?"

translation.en: [Tom] I had no professional skills.
translation.it: Non avevo esperienza.

translation.en: I had only held very low jobs. You know, dishwasher, busboy.
translation.it: Avevo fatto solo lavori di basso livello, come il lavapiatti, l'aiuto cameriere.

translation.en: So when I heard they were working on a basketball startup, that was a lifeline for me, right?
translation.it: Una start-up di basket fu un'ancora di salvezza per me.

translation.en: 'Cause I just wanted to stay connected to the game,
translation.it: Perché volevo restare nel basket

translation.en: and I wanted to wear shorts to work. [laughs]
translation.it: e lavorare in pantaloncini.

translation.en: [Jay] We had the meeting at a pizza parlor,
translation.it: Ci incontrammo in una pizzeria

translation.en: and we were trying to figure out what's the identity of the brand that we would bring.
translation.it: per capire che tipo di marchio volevamo creare.

translation.en: When you make a bucket, and you get fouled,
translation.it: Mentre tiri e subisci fallo,

translation.en: 'cause you know the basket is going in, you say, "And one."
translation.it: sapendo che entrerà dici: "And one. E uno".

translation.en: You don't say, "And one," you scream, "And one."
translation.it: Non lo dici. Lo urli.

translation.en: -That's the ultimate way to talk shit. -It's like, "And one, motherfucker!"
translation.it: - È gergo di moda. - "E uno, figlio di troia"

translation.en: [Tom] And then I had this idea. We can put trash talking on a T-shirt.
translation.it: E poi ebbi un'idea. Trash-talking sulle magliette.

translation.en: So I wrote up 30 slogans, and I was like, "This is our first shirt."
translation.it: Scrissi 30 slogan pensando: "Questa è la nostra prima maglietta".

translation.en: "I'm sorry I thought you could play."
translation.it: "Pensavo sapessi giocare."

translation.en: "I'm the bus driver. I take everyone to school."
translation.it: "Sono l'autista. Vi porto a scuola."

translation.en: "Wear a collar. You just got dogged."
translation.it: "Metti il collare. Giochi da cane."

translation.en: Probably the most famous one, which is, "Your game is as ugly as your girl."
translation.it: "Il tuo gioco fa schifo come la tua ragazza."

translation.en: [Tom] There were, like, six more,
translation.it: Ce n'erano altri sei ed era la prima volta

translation.en: and they were all like the very first time I sat down to write trash talk.
translation.it: Ce n'erano altri sei ed era la prima volta che mi ci cimentavo.

translation.en: But it was really the culmination of 15 years of playing all the time.
translation.it: Ma era il risultato del fatto che avevo giocato per 15 anni.

translation.en: [Tom] So when we started with AND1, we didn't know how merchandising worked,
translation.it: All'inizio di AND1, non conoscevamo il merchandising o il commercio.

translation.en: how retail worked.
translation.it: non conoscevamo il merchandising o il commercio.

translation.en: We didn't know anything.
translation.it: Non sapevamo niente.

translation.en: So we were creating our own culture, and sometimes that was a beautiful thing,
translation.it: Quindi creavamo la nostra cultura e a volte era una cosa bella,

translation.en: and sometimes it was Lord of the Flies.
translation.it: altre era Il signore delle mosche.

translation.en: Two Wharton degrees and a Stanford degree, and we're selling T-shirts out of the back of a hatchback.
translation.it: Due lauree Wharton e una Stanford e vendiamo magliette sul retro di un'auto.

translation.en: The first year we lost money.
translation.it: Il primo anno perdemmo soldi.

translation.en: But I remember the feeling of someone saying,
translation.it: Ma ricordo quando qualcuno diceva:

translation.en: "I wanna pay you for your shirts." I was like, "Wow."
translation.it: "Voglio pagare le vostre magliette". E io: "Wow".

translation.en: And people loved the trash-talking shirts. So we felt like, you know, we might have something here.
translation.it: La gente amava le magliette provocatorie. E iniziammo a crederci.

translation.en: And then we ended up getting an order for three or four styles from Foot Locker.
translation.it: E alla fine la Foot Locker ci ordinò tre o quattro stili diversi.

translation.en: Holy cow. We just got a $13,000 order.
translation.it: Accidenti. Abbiamo un ordine da 13.000 dollari.

translation.en: The other stores see kids walking around with our shirts, and they're calling us.
translation.it: Gli altri negozi vedono i bambini con le magliette e ci chiamano.

translation.en: For the first time, we're not calling people. -[ringing] -People are calling us.
translation.it: Per la prima volta, sono gli altri a chiamare noi.

translation.en: Okay. We got something here. Like, this is gonna go.
translation.it: Qui c'è qualcosa. Questo venderà.

translation.en: Turning into some big business for a T-shirt company.
translation.it: Grandi affari per una ditta di magliette.

translation.en: This kind of fashion, not the kind of thing you see every day, but they're on to something.
translation.it: Non è il tipo di moda che si vede tutti i giorni, ma funziona.

translation.en: Come on. We wanna do it, don't we?
translation.it: Andiamo. Vogliamo farlo, vero?

translation.en: Well, I was looking forward to playing basketball, but I guess that's out the window.
translation.it: Volevo giocare a basket, ma non è più un'opzione.

translation.en: You want some of me--
translation.it: Mi vuoi pronto…

translation.en: [Tom] Within that first year,
translation.it: NO, DAVVERO. FAI SCHIFO. Nel primo anno, arrivammo a 1,6 milioni di vendite.

translation.en: we ended up doing about 1.6 million in sales.
translation.it: Nel primo anno, arrivammo a 1,6 milioni di vendite.

translation.en: Then the challenge becomes, "Okay. What's next though?"
translation.it: Poi la sfida diventa: "Ok, e ora?"

translation.en: We knew we wanted to be a billion-dollar company.
translation.it: Volevamo essere un'azienda da miliardi di dollari.

translation.en: So from day one, we were competing with only one brand.
translation.it: Il nostro rivale era un solo marchio.

translation.en: Nike was a company we emulated the most. And they associate themselves with great talent.
translation.it: La Nike era l'azienda che più imitavamo. Si associano a grandi talenti.

translation.en: Here we have the, uh, the new, improved Air Jordan.
translation.it: Abbiamo le nuove Air Jordan migliorate.

translation.en: We want to make the number one basketball brand in the world. We can't do that unless we do shoes.
translation.it: Volevamo essere il marchio numero uno nel basket. Ma dovevamo fare le scarpe.

translation.en: [Tom] That's where the money was at, and Nike had that whole market on lockdown.
translation.it: Lì c'erano i soldi e la Nike aveva preso tutto il mercato.

translation.en: [reporter 1] High-tech shoes and slick ads get more and more sophisticated.
translation.it: Le scarpe high-tech e gli spot sono sempre più sofisticati.

translation.en: Nike is just doing it.
translation.it: La Nike lo fa e basta.

translation.en: [reporter 2] Fourth-quarter profits improves to 126 million dollars.
translation.it: I profitti di fine anno sono saliti a 126 milioni di dollari.

translation.en: [man] When you bring the right athlete with the right advertising,
translation.it: Quando porti l'atleta giusto con lo spot giusto,

translation.en: it creates a very strong situation in the marketplace.
translation.it: crea una situazione molto forte nel mercato.

translation.en: So now, we need to go and get our own Michael Jordan.
translation.it: Dovevamo prenderci il nostro Michael Jordan.

translation.en: We couldn't start with B-level guys.
translation.it: Non potevamo iniziare con meno.

translation.en: If we're gonna do this, we need to go get an A-level guy.
translation.it: Per riuscire, dovevamo trovare un campione.

translation.en: -[announcer] Marbury behind the back to… -[whistle blows]
translation.it: Marbury.

translation.en: There's no "ifs" for Stephon Marbury from Georgia Tech.
translation.it: Non ci sono "se" per Stephon Marbury della Georgia Tech.

translation.en: He says he's ready to move on and rub shoulders with Magic and Michael.
translation.it: Si dice pronto a continuare e a confrontarsi con Magic e Michael.

translation.en: Everyone in basketball knew Steph. He was an electric basketball player.
translation.it: Tutti nel basket conoscevano Steph. Era un giocatore elettrico.

translation.en: With the fourth pick in the 1996 NBA Draft,
translation.it: Con la quarta scelta nel Draft NBA del 1996,

translation.en: the Milwaukee Bucks select Stephon Marbury from Georgia Tech University.
translation.it: i Milwaukee Bucks selezionano Stephon Marbury della Georgia Tech University.

translation.en: [reporter] This man is a can't miss.
translation.it: Quest'uomo è una promessa.

translation.en: [Seth] We effectively bet the company on Steph.
translation.it: Mettemmo l'azienda nelle mani di Steph.

translation.en: We said, "We want you to be a ten-year endorsement deal,"
translation.it: "Ti sponsorizziamo per dieci anni", una cosa inaudita

translation.en: which is unheard of for a kid who had never played a minute
translation.it: "Ti sponsorizziamo per dieci anni", una cosa inaudita per un ragazzino mai stato professionista.

translation.en: of professional basketball.
translation.it: per un ragazzino mai stato professionista.

translation.en: [announcer] From Georgia Tech, number 3, Stephon Marbury!
translation.it: Dalla Georgia Tech, il numero tre Stephon Marbury!

translation.en: [Jay] For opening night, myself and Seth are literally courtside,
translation.it: La prima sera, io e Seth siamo letteralmente a bordo campo

translation.en: and we're so excited.
translation.it: e siamo così emozionati.

translation.en: The shoes are hitting the water, coming into Foot Locker. The TV ads are running.
translation.it: La Foot Locker ha le nostre scarpe pronte. Gli spot sono in onda.

translation.en: Who knew that all we'd been building was gonna go up in smoke that night.
translation.it: Chi immaginava che quella notte sarebbe andato in fumo.

translation.en: I can still see it. Steph goes up, and I'm like, "uh-oh."
translation.it: Lo vedo ancora. Steph salta e penso: "Oh-oh".

translation.en: [announcer] Oh my goodness.
translation.it: Oh, santo cielo.

translation.en: I just broke out in a cold sweat seeing that.
translation.it: Ho iniziato a sudare freddo vedendolo.

translation.en: Our faces are white.
translation.it: Le nostre facce sono bianche.

translation.en: [Seth] Oh my God. We just ran a "breaking ankles" TV campaign for Stephon Marbury.
translation.it: Oddio. Abbiamo fatto una campagna TV sulle mosse di Stephon Marbury.

translation.en: And Stephon just broke his ankle wearing our shoes.
translation.it: E si infortuna con le nostre scarpe.

translation.en: A week before the shoes are supposed to hit.
translation.it: Una settimana prima del lancio.

translation.en: [announcer] Stephon Marbury being helped off the floor…
translation.it: Marbury viene accompagnato fuori dal campo…

translation.en: [Stephon] I usually recover real quickly, but being that this is a bit more severe,
translation.it: Di solito mi riprendo in fretta, ma questo è più grave

translation.en: I'm really hurting, you know, knowing that I can't play.
translation.it: e fa male sapere di non poter giocare.

translation.en: [Jay] And so, we're in the tunnel,
translation.it: E così, siamo nel tunnel e vediamo l'agente di Steph

translation.en: and we see Steph's agent looking at us with just, like, daggers in his eyes.
translation.it: E così, siamo nel tunnel e vediamo l'agente di Steph che ci guarda con occhi di fuoco.

translation.en: [Seth] Someone on his team says,
translation.it: Un suo compagno dice:

translation.en: "I might have Stephon go on national TV and dump your shoes in the garbage can."
translation.it: "Potrei mandare Stephon in TV a buttare le vostre scarpe nella spazzatura".

translation.en: And I literally just said, "Bro, it's been real, but I think we're done."
translation.it: Dico: "È stato reale, ma è finita. Finiremo sul lastrico dopo questa".

translation.en: "I can't figure out any way we're not gonna go broke right here."
translation.it: Finiremo sul lastrico dopo questa".

translation.en: [Jay] We wanted to play the endorsement game, wanted to out-Nike Nike, and we failed.
translation.it: Volevamo battere la Nike con gli sponsor e avevamo fallito.

translation.en: Two weeks later, we got this tape. It had been around our office.
translation.it: Due settimane dopo, vedemmo un nastro nel nostro ufficio.

translation.en: There were a couple of interns, and they were always watching it.
translation.it: Un paio di tirocinanti lo guardavano sempre.

translation.en: [Jay] The video blew our minds.
translation.it: Il video ci sconvolse.

translation.en: [Seth] I was like, "Holy shit."
translation.it: Pensai: "Merda".

translation.en: I've seen a lot of basketball.
translation.it: Ne avevo visto di basket.

translation.en: [chuckling] I've never seen this before.
translation.it: Quello non l'avevo mai visto.

translation.en: [Tom] And in this game was 15-year-old Rafer Alston,
translation.it: E in questa partita c'era il quindicenne Rafer Alston

translation.en: who was called "Skip 2 My Lou."
translation.it: alias "Skip 2 My Lou".

translation.en: [announcer] Show some love for my homeboy,
translation.it: Dimostrate amore al mio amico,

translation.en: [Skip 2 My Lou] New York streetball style, it's a style where you just let your imagination flow.
translation.it: Lo streetball di New York è uno stile che libera la fantasia.

translation.en: [Skip 2 My Lou] It was more poetry in motion.
translation.it: Era poesia in movimento.

translation.en: It was more trickery and sorcery.
translation.it: Era inganno e magia.

translation.en: I always wanted to deceive you.
translation.it: Ho sempre voluto ingannarti.

translation.en: A third of what he's doing is illegal right here.
translation.it: Fa cose che sono illegali qui.

translation.en: But I don't really think it matters because it's so unique.
translation.it: Ma non credo che sia importante perché è così unico.

translation.en: Streetball is hip-hop,
translation.it: Lo streetball è hip-hop,

translation.en: graffiti, breakdancing,
translation.it: graffiti, breakdance

translation.en: all-in-one.
translation.it: tutto in uno.

translation.en: And the crowd is our music.
translation.it: E il pubblico è la nostra musica.

translation.en: Winning has nothing to do with streetball.
translation.it: Vincere non conta niente nello streetball.

translation.en: [Skip 2 My Lou] Your team, they could lose, but if you've electrified the crowd,
translation.it: Se la tua squadra elettrizza il pubblico, pur perdendo,

translation.en: they were satisfied. [chuckling]
translation.it: sono tutti contenti.

translation.en: [The Main Event] The court is the canvas.
translation.it: La campo è la tela.

translation.en: The style of play that you have is your ink.
translation.it: Lo stile di gioco è il tuo inchiostro.

translation.en: And the player that you is is the artist.
translation.it: E il giocatore che sei è l'artista.

translation.en: A lot of us come up through the inner city in single-parent homes.
translation.it: Molti di noi crescono nei quartieri poveri con un unico genitore.

translation.en: [The Dribbling Machine] My mom had me when she was 15.
translation.it: Mia madre mi ha avuto a 15 anni.

translation.en: I grew up in one of the biggest projects in the Bronx.
translation.it: Sono cresciuto nelle grandi case popolari del Bronx.

translation.en: I never really had a steady home to practice my skills.
translation.it: Non ho mai avuto una casa stabile per esercitarmi.

translation.en: It wasn't about sports, it was about survival.
translation.it: Non si trattava di sport, ma di sopravvivenza.

translation.en: The first time I touched a basketball, I probably was maybe 11, 12?
translation.it: Toccai un pallone da basket la prima volta forse a 11 anni?

translation.en: Just didn't really have the basketball skills or basketball IQ.
translation.it: Non avevo né le capacità né l'intelligenza per il basket.

translation.en: But my dad would take me out to different parks, and that's where I honed a lot of my skills.
translation.it: Ma mio padre mi portava in diversi parchi ed fu lì che imparai.

translation.en: Streetball, it's a way of life here.
translation.it: Lo streetball è uno stile di vita qui.

translation.en: [The Dribbling Machine] It wasn't about money. Because that was the NBA.
translation.it: Non si trattava di soldi. Perché quella era la NBA.

translation.en: [announcer] Swish picks up Dumars, who lets it fly, and he hits it again for three!
translation.it: Swish va a prendere Dumars, che la fa volare e sono tre punti!

translation.en: [The Main Event] Where we came from,
translation.it: Da dove venivamo noi,

translation.en: a lot of people don't have that type of money to go see an NBA game at the Madison Square Garden.
translation.it: in pochi avevano i soldi per una partita dell'NBA al Madison Square Garden.

translation.en: So for us, Rucker was the main stage in New York City.
translation.it: Per noi, il Rucker era il palco principale di New York.

translation.en: Streetball was born there.
translation.it: Lo streetball nacque lì.

translation.en: When they first took me to watch a game, I was little and skinny.
translation.it: Quando vidi la prima partita ero piccolo e magro.

translation.en: I made my way to the front, and I just sat right there on the court.
translation.it: Arrivai là davanti e mi sedetti sul campo.

translation.en: I'm watching my idols play.
translation.it: Guardai i miei idoli giocare.

translation.en: Dr. J.
translation.it: Dr. Jay.

translation.en: People that were seven, eight blocks away, you could hear them.
translation.it: Si sentiva la gente a otto isolati di distanza.

translation.en: You knew where everyone was at.
translation.it: Sapevi dove erano tutti.

translation.en: Most people at some point realized,
translation.it: In molti capirono:

translation.en: "I might not make D1. I might not make the NBA."
translation.it: "Potrei non arrivare alla D1 o all'NBA".

translation.en: But you can still go play at the playground.
translation.it: Ma puoi sempre giocare al campetto.

translation.en: So I realized what's on this tape. It's just pure, like, self-expression.
translation.it: E capii cosa c'era su quel nastro. Pura espressione di sé.

translation.en: And that's when I started to understand this is the essence of who we are.
translation.it: Cominciai a capire l'essenza di ciò che siamo.

translation.en: We're playground.
translation.it: Siamo un campetto.

translation.en: We're grassroots. We're everyman basketball.
translation.it: Siamo gente comune. Il basket di tutti.

translation.en: We're attitude, we're raw expression, we're art.
translation.it: Siamo mentalità, espressione cruda, arte.

translation.en: And this is a strategic position that Nike can't touch.
translation.it: Una posizione che la Nike non può toccare.

translation.en: [reporter] We interrupt this program to bring you the following Special Report.
translation.it: Interrompiamo il programma per un'edizione straordinaria.

translation.en: [anchor] Good morning and thank you for joining us.
translation.it: Buongiorno e benvenuti.

translation.en: It's the day Bulls fans around the world have been dreading for years.
translation.it: È il giorno che i tifosi dei Bulls temono da anni.

translation.en: Michael Jordan is scheduled to make a big announcement
translation.it: Michael Jordan farà un grande annuncio

translation.en: at the United Center any minute now.
translation.it: allo United Center tra breve.

translation.en: I am here to… to announce my retirement from the game of basketball.
translation.it: Sono qui per annunciare il mio ritiro dal basket.

translation.en: [Jay] Now, all of a sudden, with Jordan being out
translation.it: FINE DI UN'AIR-A All'improvviso, con Jordan fuori

translation.en: and there being no games on because of the NBA lockout,
translation.it: e senza partite a causa del blocco della NBA,

translation.en: there was a void in the basketball market.
translation.it: c'era un vuoto nel mercato del basket.

translation.en: There was this opportunity for new content that didn't exist before.
translation.it: C'era un'opportunità per nuovi contenuti che prima non esistevano.

translation.en: [Jay] As a business, how can we take that experience of a streetball game at the Rucker
translation.it: Come società, come usare una partita di streetball al Rucker

translation.en: and make it something that actually fills that void?
translation.it: per riempire quel vuoto?

translation.en: One of the young guys that we had hired to do product placement in New York,
translation.it: Uno dei ragazzi assunto per fare product placement a New York,

translation.en: a guy named Set Free, who was a DJ, producer, hip-hop artist.
translation.it: di nome Set Free, era dj, produttore e artista hip-hop.

translation.en: He says, "We should make that a mixtape and just give it away."
translation.it: Disse: "Dovremmo fare un mixtape e regalarlo".

translation.en: It ended up being this collection of footage plus unreleased music.
translation.it: Finì per essere una raccolta di filmati con musica inedita.

translation.en: This is Sway from the World Famous Wake Up Show,
translation.it: Sono Sway dal World Famous Wake Up Show

translation.en: and y'all are about to view the AND1 Mixtape on video.
translation.it: e state per vedere l'AND1 Mixtape in video

translation.en: Coming to you live. Keep it banging!
translation.it: in diretta. Una forza!

translation.en: AND1 pressed 50,000 old-school VHS tapes.
translation.it: AND1 fece 50.000 vecchie cassette VHS.

translation.en: We gave away through the street teams, clubs, courts, neighborhood barbershops.
translation.it: Le distribuivamo a squadre di strada, club, campi, botteghe di barbieri.

translation.en: And it was like the new crack. It went rampant in the inner city.
translation.it: Era come una nuova droga. Dilagava nei quartieri poveri.

translation.en: [Tom] Each person sharing it with another dozen or two dozen or three dozen people.
translation.it: Ognuno la condivideva con un'altra dozzina o due di persone.

translation.en: We had this insane viral marketing in the pre-internet age. [chuckling]
translation.it: Era un folle marketing virale nell'era pre-internet.

translation.en: After Mixtape came out, I was like a hero in New York City.
translation.it: Dopo l'uscita del Mixtape, ero una sorta di eroe a New York.

translation.en: Before I know it, I have 20 people walking behind me.
translation.it: All'improvviso, ero seguito da 20 persone.

translation.en: "Oh man, Skip. I wanna walk with you. Can I walk inside the park with you?"
translation.it: "Skip, posso camminare nel parco con te?"

translation.en: [Sway] Look out for Volume 2, y'all! AND1 Mixtape!
translation.it: Arriva il volume 2, gente! AND1 Mixtape!

translation.en: By Monday, we had calls coming in from people who had lost their minds.
translation.it: Il lunedì arrivarono telefonate di persone impazzite.

translation.en: We all gathered around the phone, just listening to all these messages.
translation.it: Ci radunammo ad ascoltare i tanti messaggi.

translation.en: -[beeps] -[man] Yo, that mixtape was sick.
translation.it: Quel mixtape è pazzesco.

translation.en: [man 2] Killed it, AND1!
translation.it: Alla grande, AND1!

translation.en: [man 3] Skip 2 My Lou!
translation.it: Skip 2 My Lou!

translation.en: [man 4] Hold on.
translation.it: Aspettate.

translation.en: [man 5] Need another one, please!
translation.it: Un'altra, per favore!

translation.en: -[man 6] Where is Volume 2? -[beeps]
translation.it: Dov'è il volume 2?

translation.en: Immediately the question was, "How do we do another one?"
translation.it: La domanda era: "Come farne un'altra?"

translation.en: So we created the idea for the AND1 Mixtape Tour.
translation.it: Così ci venne l'idea dell'AND1 Mixtape Tour.

translation.en: We're gonna put together the best playground pickup basketball team we can.
translation.it: Metteremo insieme la migliore squadra di streetball del Paese.

translation.en: Get your best five, and we have our best five and let's put on a game.
translation.it: I vostri migliori cinque, i nostri e mettiamo su una partita.

translation.en: But let's not just do it one time in New York.
translation.it: Ma non una volta sola a New York.

translation.en: Let's start going city to city.
translation.it: Andiamo di città in città.

translation.en: [man] I was brought on at AND1 as a tour manager and headed up Player Relations.
translation.it: Ero entrato ad AND1 come tour manager e dirigevo le relazioni con i giocatori.

translation.en: The idea was, "Hey. We're just gonna do this five-city tour."
translation.it: L'idea era: "Faremo un tour di cinque città".

translation.en: Really to get content for more mixtapes.
translation.it: Per avere contenuti per altri mixtape.

translation.en: [announcer] Shane!
translation.it: Shane!

translation.en: [The Main Event] I just got kicked out of Rutgers University 'cause of my grades.
translation.it: Ero stato cacciato dalla Rutgers per i miei voti.

translation.en: Now I'm back at home. My son was four or five. You know, I needed a job.
translation.it: Ero a casa con un figlio di quattro anni. Mi serviva un lavoro.

translation.en: [The Main Event] I get a call from AND1.
translation.it: Ricevo una chiamata da AND1.

translation.en: "Yo, you think you'll pull a game off in your hometown?"
translation.it: "Pensi che potremmo fare una partita nella tua città?"

translation.en: First phone call I made was Shane.
translation.it: Per primo chiamai Shane.

translation.en: [The Dribbling Machine] Playing streetball, but it's in my thirties,
translation.it: Giocavo a streetball, ma avevo 30 anni

translation.en: and the NBA was far-fetched for me.
translation.it: e l'NBA era impensabile per me.

translation.en: I'll never forget. I'm standing on the corner, and Main calls me.
translation.it: Non lo dimenticherò mai. Ero all'angolo e Main mi chiama.

translation.en: And it was going through one end out the other end.
translation.it: Passava da una cosa all'altra.

translation.en: The only thing that really caught my attention was,
translation.it: L'unica cosa che capii fu:

translation.en: "AND1's gonna give us free sneakers,
translation.it: "AND1 ci dà sneaker gratis

translation.en: free shorts to bust some dude's ass? Let's do it."
translation.it: e vestiario per fare il culo a qualcuno? Ci sto".

translation.en: [Duke] Welcome, ladies and gentlemen, boys and girls. My name is Duke Tango.
translation.it: Benvenuti, signore e signori. Sono Duke Tango.

translation.en: And sit back and relax because this is how we roll.
translation.it: Sedetevi e rilassatevi, così giochiamo.

translation.en: Duke Tango's the godfather announcer of streetball.
translation.it: Duke è l'annunciatore padrino dello streetball.

translation.en: If Duke Tango gave you your name,
translation.it: Se Duke Tango ti dava il nome,

translation.en: he's solidifying who you are as that streetballer.
translation.it: consolidava la tua identità di giocatore.

translation.en: Main said, "Yo, would you like to be involved with this?"
translation.it: Main mi disse: "Vorresti essere coinvolto?"

translation.en: And I looked at him like, "Who would say no to that?"
translation.it: E io: "Chi direbbe di no?"

translation.en: When you see that crowd around the corner,
translation.it: Quando vedi la folla dietro l'angolo,

translation.en: and then you walk into that park and see thousands of people?
translation.it: entri in quel parco e vedi migliaia di persone?

translation.en: Ain't no way in the world you can be prepared for that.
translation.it: Non sei preparato, non c'è modo.

translation.en: Well, I say, "Yo, Main and Shane,
translation.it: Dissi: "Yo, Main e Shane,

translation.en: let's go to Philadelphia and get AO."
translation.it: andiamo a Filadelfia a prendere AO.

translation.en: "Let's get this Headache."
translation.it: Prendiamo Headache.

translation.en: Then I got Black Widow,
translation.it: E presi Black Widow

translation.en: and Half Man Half Amazing.
translation.it: e Half Man Half Amazing.

translation.en: And so, AND1 did the first-ever contracts with streetball players.
translation.it: AND1 stipulò i primi contratti con giocatori di streetball.

translation.en: [Tom] The first stop is Linden, New Jersey.
translation.it: La prima fermata è Linden, New Jersey.

translation.en: We brought the camera crew to film both crowd and game.
translation.it: Portammo la troupe per filmare pubblico e partita.

translation.en: I don't even think I really knew what filmmaking was back then.
translation.it: Non sapevo neanche cosa significasse filmare all'epoca.

translation.en: I just knew I had a camera in my hand,
translation.it: Sapevo di avere una telecamera

translation.en: and I'm bringing the audience with me.
translation.it: e avrei portato il pubblico con me.

translation.en: I just tried to capture everything
translation.it: Cercavo di catturare tutto ciò

translation.en: that I felt and everything that I saw because it was unbelievable.
translation.it: che provavo e vedevo perché era incredibile.

translation.en: [The Main Event] This is Chris Hightower's itinerary.
translation.it: È l'itinerario di Chris Hightower.

translation.en: -[Gee Lock] This is a Hightower original? -Official.
translation.it: - È un originale Hightower? - Certo.

translation.en: [Chris] When I went on tour. they gave me a corporate car,
translation.it: In tournée, mi diedero un'auto aziendale,

translation.en: six grand in cash, and was like, "Make it work."
translation.it: seimila dollari e dovevo arrangiarmi.

translation.en: [The Dribbling Machine] We stayed in shit hotels. We shared rooms.
translation.it: Dormivamo in hotel di merda. Condividevamo le camere.

translation.en: We're playing in front of a crowd of 100 people.
translation.it: Giocavamo davanti a 100 persone.

translation.en: And now I'm in a minivan
translation.it: Ora sono in un minivan

translation.en: sitting in the chair from the house that's sliding all over in the van.
translation.it: seduto su una sedia di casa che va su e giù nel van.

translation.en: [Chris] We were our own street team.
translation.it: Eravamo la nostra squadra di strada.

translation.en: Boxes of tapes, we're passing them out, passing out flyers,
translation.it: Scatole di cassette, le diamo via coi volantini

translation.en: trying to do every and anything we could to get people to the event.
translation.it: cercando di fare di tutto per portare la gente all'evento.

translation.en: We didn't know where it was gonna go. There was no blueprint.
translation.it: Non sapevo come sarebbe andata.

translation.en: And it was really just all about having a platform
translation.it: E si trattava di avere una piattaforma

translation.en: for players like ourselves, who didn't make it to the NBA,
translation.it: perché giocatori come noi, che non erano nell'NBA,

translation.en: to get paid to play.
translation.it: fossero pagati.

translation.en: [Jay] So every year we go to one of those big trade shows.
translation.it: Ogni anno andiamo a una delle grandi fiere.

translation.en: We're running these videos outside of our booth.
translation.it: Mostriamo i video dal nostro stand.

translation.en: There's a massive crowd, and they're coming to watch Volume 2.
translation.it: C'è una folla enorme che viene a vedere il Volume 2.

translation.en: We knew at that moment that there was something here
translation.it: Capimmo di avere qualcosa in mano

translation.en: that could be much bigger than we thought, much faster than we thought.
translation.it: più grande e più veloce di quanto credevamo.

translation.en: Hot 97.5 ATL's original hip-hop and R&B station,
translation.it: Hot 97,5, radio hip-hop e R&B di Atlanta,

translation.en: I got the AND1 all-stars. I mean, y'all seen the mixtape. You seen them balling out of control.
translation.it: ho le all-star di AND1. Avete visto il mixtape. Sono grandi.

translation.en: They gonna be doing their thing today. Go check them out.
translation.it: Oggi vanno in scena. Seguiteli.

translation.en: [man] It's going down from 4:30 to 6:00.
translation.it: Dalle 16:30 alle 18:00.

translation.en: If you wanna become the next streetball player, come on down, this is your opportunity.
translation.it: Se vuoi diventare un giocatore di streetball, vieni a provare.

translation.en: [The Dribbling Machine] When we played in Atlanta, that atmosphere was totally different.
translation.it: Quando giocammo ad Atlanta, l'atmosfera era completamente diversa.

translation.en: [crowd] Hot Sauce! Hot Sauce!
translation.it: Hot Sauce!

translation.en: I can hear the crowd. The crowd is saying, "Hot Sauce."
translation.it: Sento la folla. La folla dice: "Hot Sauce".

translation.en: [The Dribbling Machine] Yo, like, who is Hot Sauce?
translation.it: Ehi, chi è Hot Sauce?

translation.en: [Hot Sauce] I used to play in the hoods in Georgia, stealing balls out of other people's yards.
translation.it: Giocavo nei sobborghi in Georgia, rubando palloni dai cortili altrui.

translation.en: I had a job, but I never could keep a job.
translation.it: Non riuscivo a tenermi un lavoro.

translation.en: My nine-to-five was just working on my handles.
translation.it: Il mio lavoro era il pallone.

translation.en: I was already a local legend.
translation.it: Ero già un mito locale.

translation.en: Every day I played, people just circled around the court.
translation.it: Quando giocavo, la gente era intorno al campo.

translation.en: [Hot Sauce] After seeing Mixtape 1 and Mixtape 2,
translation.it: Dopo aver visto Mixtape 1 e 2,

translation.en: I was hungry to be on the tapes.
translation.it: volevo esserci anch'io.

translation.en: But I didn't know what… what it would take.
translation.it: Ma non sapevo come fare.

translation.en: That's when I heard that they decided to take the tour to Atlanta.
translation.it: E poi seppi che il tour sarebbe arrivato ad Atlanta.

translation.en: That's when my opportunity came.
translation.it: Era la mia opportunità.

translation.en: I was in jail, you know, doing some of this knucklehead teenage stuff.
translation.it: Ero in prigione per stupidaggini da adolescenti.

translation.en: But the day I got out of jail, the next day was a tour game.
translation.it: Ma il giorno dopo essere uscito c'era la partita del tour.

translation.en: It was like, "Yo. What is this?"
translation.it: Pensai: "Yo. Che cos'è?"

translation.en: [Skip 2 My Lou] A lot of us are like, "What is he doing?"
translation.it: Molti di noi pensavano: "Che cosa fa?"

translation.en: It was… It was amazing.
translation.it: Era incredibile.

translation.en: When Hot Sauce did that…
translation.it: Quando Hot Sauce fece così…

translation.en: Oh baby!
translation.it: Oddio!

translation.en: That was it.
translation.it: Pazzesco.

translation.en: One man took the idea of streetball,
translation.it: Un uomo aveva preso l'idea dello streetball

translation.en: and he just flipped it.
translation.it: e l'aveva capovolta.

translation.en: The flair and his image,
translation.it: Il suo stile e la sua immagine

translation.en: it forever changed the game.
translation.it: avevano cambiato per sempre il gioco.

translation.en: [Jay] Volume 3 became "The Hot Sauce" tape.
translation.it: Il Volume 3 divenne quello di Hot Sauce.

translation.en: We got the new star. It's done. This is all about this kid Hot Sauce.
translation.it: Abbiamo la nuova stella. È fatta. Abbiamo questo ragazzo Hot Sauce.

translation.en: So we signed him.
translation.it: E lo ingaggiammo.

translation.en: [Gee Lock] From the first game on,
translation.it: Fin dalla prima partita,

translation.en: he was like an icon.
translation.it: era come un'icona.

translation.en: [Gee Lock] Once he came on the tour,
translation.it: Una volta nel tour,

translation.en: it was a whole nother animal.
translation.it: era un uomo del tutto diverso.

translation.en: [chuckling] You know what I'm saying? Like, no more minivans.
translation.it: Vedi? Niente più minivan.

translation.en: It was three-million-dollar tour buses decked out.
translation.it: Erano bus da tre milioni di dollari, moderni ed eleganti.

translation.en: -Hot Sauce! -Hot Sauce!
translation.it: - Hot Sauce! - Hot Sauce!

translation.en: Look, it's the Sauce world now. It's my show.
translation.it: Ora è il mondo di Sauce. Il mio show.

translation.en: My favorite is Hot Sauce.
translation.it: Adoro Hot Sauce.

translation.en: Hot Sauce is number one.
translation.it: Hot Sauce numero uno.

translation.en: I like Hot Sauce. He my boy.
translation.it: Hot Sauce è il mio mito.

translation.en: Hot Sauce was the guy that everyone wanted to see.
translation.it: Hot Sauce era quello che tutti volevano vedere.

translation.en: Not just the inner-city youth,
translation.it: Dai quartieri poveri

translation.en: but even the kids in the suburbs watching his tape.
translation.it: alle periferie, era il mito dei giovani.

translation.en: -He's crazy! -[man 1] I know.
translation.it: - È pazzesco! - Lo so.

translation.en: [man 2] Oh my God!
translation.it: Oh, mio Dio!

translation.en: They were studying his moves.
translation.it: Studiavano le sue mosse.

translation.en: -[The Dribbling Machine] Y2K. -[The Main Event] Y2K.
translation.it: -Y2K. -Y2K.

translation.en: [The Dribbling Machine] The Flintstone.
translation.it: Il Flintstone.

translation.en: The Boomerang. [announcer] Come on, Hot Sauce!
translation.it: Il Boomerang.

translation.en: Then you see people on the court trying to figure out,
translation.it: Sul campo cercavano di capire:

translation.en: "How did he do that?" And then doing it themselves.
translation.it: "Come ha fatto?" E poi lo imitavano.

translation.en: [man] I was the kid that would watch the Mixtapes over and over and over.
translation.it: Ero il ragazzo che guardava i Mixtape a ripetizione.

translation.en: I could do a move, but it wouldn't quite be like Hot Sauce, you know?
translation.it: Potevo fare una mossa, ma non come quella di Hot Sauce.

translation.en: The way he handled the basketball was so unique and innovative.
translation.it: Il modo in cui maneggiava il pallone era unico e innovativo.

translation.en: This guy, like, moves the crowd.
translation.it: Trascinava la folla.

translation.en: I wanted to captivate the crowd like Hot Sauce.
translation.it: Volevo conquistare la folla come Hot Sauce.

translation.en: At that time, I might've been the most popular basketball player on Earth.
translation.it: Forse ero il giocatore di basket più popolare sulla Terra.

translation.en: We got the AND1 streetballers.
translation.it: Ecco i giocatori di AND1.

translation.en: They're gonna strut their stuff out on the stage.
translation.it: Ora si esibiranno sul palco.

translation.en: Let's start it out with Hot Sauce.
translation.it: Iniziamo con Hot Sauce.

translation.en: -You got a movie coming out in September. -That was a great experience, right there.
translation.it: - Hai un film in uscita a settembre. - Una bella esperienza.

translation.en: As a business, we hadn't really tied the Mixtape to sales.
translation.it: Come società, non avevamo collegato il Mixtape alle vendite.

translation.en: But when we did Volume 3, The Rise of Hot Sauce, we partnered with Footaction.
translation.it: Ma con il Volume 3, L'ascesa di Hot Sauce, collaborammo con Footaction.

translation.en: The idea was you have to buy any AND1 product,
translation.it: L'idea era che se compravi un prodotto AND1

translation.en: and we're gonna give away a free Mixtape.
translation.it: ricevevi un Mixtape gratuito.

translation.en: We have kids from the street. They have a lot of fun.
translation.it: Abbiamo ragazzi di strada. Si divertono molto.

translation.en: And every… every, uh, consumer that we talk to connects with them.
translation.it: E il consumatore si connette con loro.

translation.en: I'm at some store buying some things, and I'm like, "Yo, that's me right there."
translation.it: Ero in un negozio a comprare delle cose ed ecco che mi vedo lì.

translation.en: Everywhere I go, I see our faces with our names.
translation.it: Ovunque vado vedo le nostre facce.

translation.en: [man] AND1 is hot right now. Really hot.
translation.it: AND1 è molto forte ora.

translation.en: These last two weeks, sales have really been bumping.
translation.it: Grandi vendite negli ultimi 15 giorni.

translation.en: And that was the first time I remember Nike paying attention.
translation.it: E la Nike finalmente ci notò.

translation.en: We got, like, three people, and we're taking on Goliath.
translation.it: Abbiamo tre persone e affrontiamo Golia.

translation.en: And when we started to out-compete,
translation.it: Quando iniziammo a competere,

translation.en: we knew we were gonna be a legitimate threat.
translation.it: sapevamo che saremmo stati una vera minaccia.

translation.en: [Seth] I'll never forget. Someone sent me a video from Nike's sales meeting.
translation.it: Non lo scorderò mai. Vidi il video della riunione vendite alla Nike.

translation.en: They had a picture of AND1 in the crosshairs.
translation.it: Avevano una foto di AND1 nel mirino.

translation.en: So it was like, "Got it. Nike took dead aim at us."
translation.it: "Chiaro. La Nike ci ha preso di mira."

translation.en: We were just consistent a top-two performing brand.
translation.it: Eravamo regolarmente tra i primi due marchi.

translation.en: And we had the mixtape tour. They didn't have anything like that.
translation.it: E avevamo il mixtape tour. Loro no.

translation.en: That's like the heart of the game, and we owned the heart of the game.
translation.it: È il cuore del gioco e noi ce l'avevamo.

translation.en: If you're Nike, you're risk-averse.
translation.it: Se sei la Nike, non rischi.

translation.en: They don't wanna offend a 50-year-old guy in middle America,
translation.it: Non vogliono offendere un cinquantenne del ceto medio

translation.en: and they sell to a broad audience. That's not who we are.
translation.it: e hanno un pubblico vasto. Noi no.

translation.en: We're selling to core people who are basketball players and know it.
translation.it: Vendiamo a persone che sono giocatori di basket e lo sanno.

translation.en: We knew that Nike felt they had to respond.
translation.it: Sapevamo che la Nike avrebbe risposto.

translation.en: And we had no idea what they were gonna do.
translation.it: E non sapevamo come.

translation.en: We got it. Let's roll sound.
translation.it: Siamo pronti, motore.

translation.en: [woman] Camera speeds.
translation.it: Partito.

translation.en: We are at the ESPN building in the "N-1" Mixtape Tour.
translation.it: Siamo nell'edificio dell'ESPN nell'"N-1" Mixtape Tour.

translation.en: You know what that means? They don't know us.
translation.it: Sapete cosa significa? Non ci conoscono.

translation.en: In 2003, ESPN came to us
translation.it: Nel 2003, l'ESPN ci contattò

translation.en: and said they wanted to do a TV show based around the tour.
translation.it: per fare un programma TV basato sul tour.

translation.en: Kind of like when reality TV was growing up.
translation.it: Come quando iniziavano i reality.

translation.en: [Chris] The basis of the ESPN show was to find that next guy.
translation.it: L'idea del programma era trovare il prossimo giocatore.

translation.en: Who's that next level of talent?
translation.it: Chi è il prossimo talento?

translation.en: [Tom] It's basically like Survivor.
translation.it: È come Survivor.

translation.en: We'll go to Portland, Atlanta, Seattle.
translation.it: Andremo a Portland, Atlanta, Seattle.

translation.en: And the winner, the survivor, the ultimate pick,
translation.it: E il vincitore, il sopravvissuto, il migliore

translation.en: is someone who gets an AND1 contract.
translation.it: ottiene un contratto con AND1.

translation.en: Well, another unique event is returning to the capital city.
translation.it: Un altro evento unico torna nella capitale.

translation.en: The AND1 Mixtape Tour team is a collection of basketball characters
translation.it: Il team di And1 Mixtape Tour è fatto di personaggi del basket

translation.en: with nicknames and hip-hop playing hoops.
translation.it: con soprannomi hip-hop da canestro.

translation.en: If you think you can run with these guys, show up tomorrow from 4:00 to 6:30.
translation.it: Se ti senti in grado, presentati domani dalle 16:00 alle 18:30.

translation.en: They're looking for a few extra players to play.
translation.it: Cercano qualche giocatore in più.

translation.en: I mean, keep doing what you're doing.
