translation.en: [anchor] Jordan's have sprung
translation.it: Le Jordan sono nate

translation.en: from the creative partnership of shoe designer Tinker Hatfield.
translation.it: dalla collaborazione con lo stilista Tinker Hatfield.

translation.en: [Jay] In a time where designers become their own celebrities,
translation.it: In un'epoca in cui gli stilisti erano celebrità,

translation.en: Tom was super low-key, never wanted to have his name out there.
translation.it: Tom teneva sempre un profilo basso, non voleva mai firmarsi.

translation.en: But he was one of the most incredibly creative designers.
translation.it: Ma era uno degli stilisti più bravi e creativi.

translation.en: I'm running my little kingdom. Just gonna generate high-quality shoes,
translation.it: Gestisco il mio piccolo regno. Creo scarpe di alta qualità

translation.en: and if I keep doing my job, we're gonna beat Nike.
translation.it: e se continuo a farlo, batteremo la Nike.

translation.en: [Duke] Playing at Madison Square Garden, the mecca.
translation.it: Giocare al Madison Square Garden, la mecca.

translation.en: You know that I was hyped.
translation.it: Ero in fibrillazione.

translation.en: [The Main Event] The anticipation was crazy.
translation.it: L'attesa era pazzesca.

translation.en: [The Main Event] I'm looking around like, "Damn, this is what it would have been like in the NBA?"
translation.it: Mi guardo intorno: "Accidenti. Sarebbe stato così all'NBA?"

translation.en: We're in their same locker room. It's the same atmosphere.
translation.it: È lo stesso spogliatoio, la stessa atmosfera.

translation.en: [announcer] Welcome to New York City!
translation.it: Benvenuti a New York!

translation.en: Took me 25 years to get here. I'm ready to cry.
translation.it: Ci ho messo 25 anni ad arrivare qui. Ce la farò. Lo sento.

translation.en: I'm feeling this. I'm really feeling this.
translation.it: Ci ho messo 25 anni ad arrivare qui. Ce la farò. Lo sento. Lo sento davvero.

translation.en: [The Main Event] Out of all the games we wanted to win, we wanted to win at Madison Square Garden
translation.it: Tra tutte le partite che volevamo vincere, volevamo vincere al Madison Square Garden.

translation.en: because at the end of the day, you definitely want to win where you from.
translation.it: Perché alla fine, vuoi vincere nel posto da cui vieni.

translation.en: [Hot Sauce] I'm actually on the NBA floor, scared as hell.
translation.it: Sono sul campo dell'NBA, spaventato a morte.

translation.en: But you would never know it, walking around shaking your head,
translation.it: Ma nessuno se ne accorge, perché scuoto la testa,

translation.en: like, "Yeah, Sauce, you about to kill,"
translation.it: tipo: "Sì, Sauce, spaccherai",

translation.en: and deep down inside, I'm scared as a motherfucker, boy. I'm scared as hell.
translation.it: mentre dentro me la faccio sotto. Sono spaventato a morte, cazzo.

translation.en: [Gee Lock] You had dreams of going to the NBA, you already felt like you made it
translation.it: Sognavi di giocare nell'Nba. Sentivi già di avercela fatta

translation.en: because here's your name on the big scoreboard.
translation.it: perché c'è il tuo nome sul gran tabellone.

translation.en: Here's your name in bright lights.
translation.it: C'è il tuo nome sotto i riflettori.

translation.en: I'm playing in front of thousands of people.
translation.it: Gioco davanti a migliaia di persone.

translation.en: Boy, when we played on to that old-school Madison Square Garden court?
translation.it: Quando giocavamo al vecchio campo del Madison Square Garden?

translation.en: That bring a tear to your eye. That emotional.
translation.it: Ti vengono le lacrime agli occhi dall'emozione.

translation.en: That was our bragging rights to our family, to our friends on,
translation.it: Era il nostro momento per vantarci con la famiglia e gli amici:

translation.en: "No. We didn't make the NBA, but we made it."
translation.it: "No, non siamo entrati nell'NBA, ma ce l'abbiamo fatta".

translation.en: [announcer] Are you ready?
translation.it: Siete pronti?

translation.en: [Duke] Professor! Alley-oop!
translation.it: Professore! Alley-oop!

translation.en: -Oh yeah! Yeah! -[crowd shouting, cheering]
translation.it: Oh, sì! Sì!

translation.en: It was ridiculous. I couldn't believe it.
translation.it: Era ridicolo. Non potevo crederci.

translation.en: It took so much time and energy to get here.
translation.it: Tutto il tempo e l'energia per arrivare qui.

translation.en: [Duke] Oh baby! It's Sizzle and The Pharmacist.
translation.it: Ecco! Ecco Sizzle e il farmacista.

translation.en: The New York game was a competitive game.
translation.it: La partita preliminare era una gara competitiva.

translation.en: It was unlike all of most of our other games.
translation.it: Era diversa da quasi tutte le altre.

translation.en: [Duke] Jump shot, 15-footer, nothing but the bottom of the net on.
translation.it: Tiro in sospensione, da 3 metri, entra dritto nel canestro.

translation.en: Helicopter. Looking at it. Bounce pass. Watch this!
translation.it: John "Helicopter" Humprey. La passa a Bomb. Attenzione!

translation.en: In Madison Square Garden, if there's enough excitement,
translation.it: Al Madison Square Garden, se c'è abbastanza entusiasmo,

translation.en: the building shakes. Half the block shakes.
translation.it: l'edificio trema. Metà dell'isolato trema.

translation.en: [Duke] Looking to change. Professor. AO!
translation.it: Cambia. Professore. AO!

translation.en: No matter who's on the floor, we gotta keep this intensity.
translation.it: Chiunque c'è in campo, dobbiamo tenere questa statistica.

translation.en: [Duke] That jump shot is good!
translation.it: Quel tiro è buono!

translation.en: Oh gravy!
translation.it: Facile!

translation.en: This is The Main Event! Man.
translation.it: Questo è Main Event! Cavolo.

translation.en: You done hit a jump shot in front of 19,000 people at the mecca.
translation.it: Un tiro in sospensione davanti a 19.000 persone alla mecca. Non c'è niente di meglio.

translation.en: You can't get no better than that.
translation.it: davanti a 19.000 persone alla mecca. Non c'è niente di meglio.

translation.en: [The Main Event] I met AND1 when I was 26 years old.
translation.it: Conobbi la AND1 quando avevo 26 anni.

translation.en: That bulk of my NBA days was over,
translation.it: I miei giorni nell'NBA erano finiti,

translation.en: but my story, in a nutshell, is that I never gave up.
translation.it: ma, in breve, non mi ero mai arreso.

translation.en: [Duke] New York City!
translation.it: New York!

translation.en: If you like what you see, then make some noise!
translation.it: Se vi piace quello che vedete, fatevi sentire!

translation.en: [Duke] Let's give it up for both these ball clubs!
translation.it: Un applauso per entrambe le squadre!

translation.en: You got it. You can get it.
translation.it: Ce l'hai fatta. È tuo.

translation.en: -[man] Tell me about playing it, though. -Hey, man…
translation.it: - Parlami del gioco però. - Cavolo…

translation.en: That shit was fun, man.
translation.it: È stato divertente.

translation.en: Let's get in, man.
translation.it: Venite.

translation.en: -One, two, three, AND1. -[all] AND1!
translation.it: Uno, due, tre, AND1.

translation.en: [commentator] So we're ready for the first slam dunk competition in three years.
translation.it: Siamo pronti per la prima gara di schiacciate in tre anni.

translation.en: The last time…
translation.it: L'ultima volta…

translation.en: Never forget watching the dunk contest with Vince Carter, who later signed with Nike.
translation.it: Non scorderò mai la gara con Vince Carter che poi firmò con la Nike.

translation.en: [commentator 1] …and here is the man that this crowd wants to see. Vince Carter with his first dunk!
translation.it: …ed ecco l'uomo che tutti vogliono vedere. Vince Carter e la sua prima schiacciata!

translation.en: [commentator 2] Let's go home!
translation.it: Andiamo a casa!

translation.en: And Vince has maybe the best performance ever
translation.it: E Vince ha forse la migliore prestazione

translation.en: in a dunk contest in AND1 Tai Chis.
translation.it: in una gara di schiacciate con le Tai Chi di AND1.

translation.en: Watching it blew our minds.
translation.it: Guardarlo ci sconvolse.

translation.en: We pretty much lose our cool, right? It's like, "This is awesome."
translation.it: Perdiamo un po' di flemma. "È fantastico".

translation.en: And he did things that nobody thought were even possible.
translation.it: E faceva cose che nessuno pensava possibili.

translation.en: While wearing our product.
translation.it: Con i nostri prodotti.

translation.en: We were like, "Thank you so much for wearing our shoes for free."
translation.it: "Grazie per aver messo le nostre scarpe gratis."

translation.en: [Tom] That was the peak of AND1, you know?
translation.it: Quello fu il picco di AND1.

translation.en: And I think it was literally like two or three months later.
translation.it: E credo che fosse due o tre mesi dopo.

translation.en: I turned on the TV.
translation.it: Accesi la TV.

translation.en: I heard a ball bouncing. Boom. Ba-boom. Ba-boom, boom, boom.
translation.it: Una palla rimbalzava.

translation.en: -[man grunting] -[Seth] And I see the logo.
translation.it: E vedo il logo.

translation.en: The first word that entered my brain was "fuck."
translation.it: Pensai subito: "Cazzo".

translation.en: It's Nike.
translation.it: È la Nike.

translation.en: Freestyle is all about hip-hop, streetball, and self-expression.
translation.it: Il freestyle è hip-hop, streetball ed espressione di sé.

translation.en: They've co-opted our streetball positioning
translation.it: Abbinarono la nostra idea di streetball

translation.en: with this incredibly beautifully shot TV campaign.
translation.it: a questa campagna televisiva splendidamente girata.

translation.en: I mean, that was a good spot.
translation.it: Era un bello spot.

translation.en: It's got an attitude. Hip-hop beat to it.
translation.it: Aveva personalità. Il ritmo dell'hip-hop.

translation.en: But it's Nike, and they're better than that. They're copying us.
translation.it: Ma è la Nike e sono meglio di così. Ci copiano.

translation.en: [Jay] That TV commercial achieved more in 30 seconds
translation.it: Quello spot ottenne più risultati in 30 secondi

translation.en: than we did over five years of the Mixtape.
translation.it: dei nostri in cinque anni di Mixtape.

translation.en: Gotta be the shoes. Nike surging.
translation.it: Devono essere le scarpe. La Nike risorge.

translation.en: [reporter 1] Investors came running back to Nike.
translation.it: Gli investitori tornano alla Nike.

translation.en: It's living up to its motto. "Just Do It."
translation.it: All'altezza del motto. "Just do it."

translation.en: [reporter 2] Just taking over this whole streetball game.
translation.it: Ha preso il controllo dello streetball.

translation.en: They took our movement,
translation.it: È la nostra idea,

translation.en: put a nice shiny satin bow on it with some glitter, and called it theirs.
translation.it: ci hanno messo un fiocco coi brillantini e l'hanno fatta loro.

translation.en: They basically crushed us in the snap of a finger.
translation.it: Ci hanno schiacciati schioccando le dita.

translation.en: [narrator] In a fight for glory, heart is mandatory.
translation.it: Nella lotta per la gloria, il cuore è d'obbligo.

translation.en: Nike Underground's King of the Court. Sundays at 8:00 pm, 7:00 central on MTV2.
translation.it: l re del campo di Nike Underground. Domenica alle 20:00, 19:00 fuso centrale su MTV2.

translation.en: I don't know if they spent 10 million, 20 million, 50 million behind it.
translation.it: Non so se ci spesero 10, 20, 50 milioni.

translation.en: I know when I saw that TV commercial that I realized, "Shit. We don't have time to wait. Let's go."
translation.it: So che quando vidi lo spot, pensai: "Merda. Non abbiamo tempo da perdere.

translation.en: "We gotta make some decisions. We gotta move."
translation.it: Dobbiamo muoverci in fretta".

translation.en: I'm on TV!
translation.it: Sono in TV!

translation.en: [producer] How would you respond to someone who felt that the company
translation.it: Come risponderesti a qualcuno che crede che la società

translation.en: built its wealth off the back of the players?
translation.it: si sia arricchita sulle spalle dei giocatori?

translation.en: How would I respond
translation.it: Come risponderei

translation.en: to somebody feeling like the players was exploited by the company?
translation.it: a chi crede che i giocatori siano stati sfruttati dalla società?

translation.en: I would say, "I know the company was making a lot of money."
translation.it: Direi: "So che la società faceva un sacco di soldi".

translation.en: After the games, you see the merchandise booth.
translation.it: Dopo le partite, vedevi lo stand dei prodotti.

translation.en: Mad units with they faces on it, right?
translation.it: Un sacco di merce coi nomi dei giocatori.

translation.en: [man] We sold out again.
translation.it: Di nuovo tutto esaurito.

translation.en: [Gee Lock] Players be like, "Yo. I ain't get paid for that."
translation.it: I giocatori: "Non ci danno niente".

translation.en: It was the downfall of everything.
translation.it: Fu il declino di tutto.

translation.en: [woman] We're at the warehouse.
translation.it: Siamo al magazzino dove riceviamo e spediamo

translation.en: We receive, ship, and pack, uh, the AND1 product for everyone.
translation.it: Siamo al magazzino dove riceviamo e spediamo i prodotti di And1 a tutti.

translation.en: [The Dribbling Machine] Up at 8:00 just to meet the people in the warehouse.
translation.it: Mi sveglio alle 8:00 per incontrare la gente al magazzino.

translation.en: Courtesy.
translation.it: Un favore.

translation.en: How many courtesy things are we gonna do?
translation.it: Quanti favori dobbiamo fare?

translation.en: This company was making millions and millions of dollars.
translation.it: La società guadagnava milioni di dollari.

translation.en: But we the ones who make the money for y'all.
translation.it: Ma eravamo noi a fare i soldi per voi.

translation.en: It started becoming a thing that we're gettin' pizza,
translation.it: Iniziò a essere normale ricevere la pizza,

translation.en: but we go on a staff bus,
translation.it: ma usavamo l'autobus dello staff.

translation.en: they got everything.
translation.it: Loro avevano tutto.

translation.en: They got filet mignon, calamari, seltzer water, all the good shit.
translation.it: Il filetto, i calamari, la soda, tutta la roba buona.

translation.en: What are you eating, Shane?
translation.it: Che mangi, Shane?

translation.en: Before the game, uh,
translation.it: Prima della partita,

translation.en: Buca shrimp parmesan.
translation.it: parmigiana di gamberi di Buca.

translation.en: [Chris] A lot of guys would say, "You got to take care of us."
translation.it: In molti dicevano: "Dovete pensare a noi.

translation.en: "Why are we not eating?" "Wouldn't be no tour if there were no players."
translation.it: Perché non mangiamo? Non ci sarebbe tour senza giocatori".

translation.en: Because you're not wrong. Like, y'all should be eating, but you don't gotta be so aggressive with it.
translation.it: Non avete torto. Dovreste mangiare tutti, ma senza essere così aggressivi.

translation.en: [Headache] I'm throwing it… I'm throwing it on their bus.
translation.it: Lo butto sul loro autobus.

translation.en: [Duke] It's over now.
translation.it: Ora basta.

translation.en: He throws a hot pizza on the tour manager's face!
translation.it: Lancia una pizza calda in faccia al tour manager!

translation.en: [Headache] Tell her what I said. Tell her she got one more time.
translation.it: Dille cos'ho detto. Lo faccia di nuovo.

translation.en: I'll smack the shit out of her. I'm dead serious.
translation.it: La massacro. Dico sul serio.

translation.en: [producer] How did you guys decide which players would be making
translation.it: Come avete deciso quali giocatori avrebbero fatto

translation.en: a certain amount of money over others?
translation.it: una certa cifra di soldi?

translation.en: Not me. The only… The only conversation I ever got involved with
translation.it: Non io. Fui coinvolto solo in una conversazione

translation.en: was with Sauce and his agent.
translation.it: con Sauce e il suo agente.

translation.en: It's my hometown. Still go down.
translation.it: È la mia città. Va ricordata.

translation.en: [Seth] He says, "Hey, Seth. You're a really nice guy."
translation.it: Dice: "Seth, sei un bravo ragazzo".

translation.en: I think to myself, "Yes, I am, motherfucker."
translation.it: E io penso: "Sì, lo sono, figlio di troia."

translation.en: He says, "Hey. Sauce wants this, or he's gonna go to Reebok."
translation.it: Dice: "Sauce vuole questo o andrà alla Rebook".

translation.en: I was like, "Let him go to Reebok, bro."
translation.it: E io dico: "Che ci vada".

translation.en: Reebok's gonna kill that dude's career. Nobody wants to be with Reebok.
translation.it: Gli distruggerà la carriera. Nessuno vuole la Reebok.

translation.en: It was interesting 'cause there really wasn't a pay structure.
translation.it: Non c'era una struttura di pagamento.

translation.en: Main Event was like 90 to 100.
translation.it: Main Event prendeva tra i 90 e i 100 mila.

translation.en: And AO was around that, 80 to 90.
translation.it: AO prendeva tra gli 80 e i 90.

translation.en: Half Man was between like 60 and 75.
translation.it: Half Man tra i 60 e i 75.

translation.en: We had lower-tier guys that were getting like 15.
translation.it: I ragazzi meno in vista ne prendevano 15.000.

translation.en: But that's for three months of work.
translation.it: Ma per tre mesi di lavoro.

translation.en: Because by the time September rolled around, there is no more tours.
translation.it: Perché dopo settembre non c'erano più tour.

translation.en: But we would judge guys on who got the most "oohs" and "ahs,"
translation.it: Ma noi giudicavamo i ragazzi sugli "ooh" e gli "ah" che ottenevano

translation.en: and obviously, Hot Sauce was the man.
translation.it: e, di certo, quello era Hot Sauce.

translation.en: It was plenty of moments of dudes feeling frustrated,
translation.it: C'erano molti momenti in cui i ragazzi si sentivano frustrati,

translation.en: of not making enough money as somebody else was making.
translation.it: perché non guadagnavano come alcuni degli altri.

translation.en: But on the AND1 tours, best to not tell nobody how much you getting,
translation.it: Ma nei tour di AND1 era meglio non dire a nessuno quanto prendevi,

translation.en: but they gonna say it because they like stunting on each other.
translation.it: ma lo facevano per creare imbarazzo tra loro.

translation.en: Let's go, baby.
translation.it: Andiamo.

translation.en: Dollars, dollars, dollars. Yeah.
translation.it: Dollari. Sì.

translation.en: I had to get something new for 2005, you know. A little bling. A little something.
translation.it: Mi serviva una cosa nuova per il 2005. Un gioiello. Qualcosa.

translation.en: This is Sizzle's crib. You know what I'm saying?
translation.it: Questa è la tana di Sizzle.

translation.en: This… this is my second crib. I got two cribs, whatever.
translation.it: La mia seconda tana. Ne ho due.

translation.en: I remember Hot Sauce had a car that could talk.
translation.it: Hot Sauce aveva un'auto che parlava.

translation.en: [car] Greetings, Hot Sauce.
translation.it: Salve, Hot Sauce.

translation.en: [laughing] People hated that shit.
translation.it: Gli altri odiavano quella stronzata.

translation.en: I tried to never get into any money talks.
translation.it: Cercavo di non parlare di soldi.

translation.en: I knew that I was sort of the new guy, and I had a lot of marketability,
translation.it: Sapevo di essere il nuovo arrivato, di funzionare sul mercato

translation.en: and I felt like my salary was great.
translation.it: e ritenevo di avere un ottimo stipendio.

translation.en: [director] And action.
translation.it: E azione.

translation.en: There was definitely a little jealousy rolling around
translation.it: Serpeggiava sicuramente un po' di gelosia

translation.en: from players being promoted more than others.
translation.it: verso i giocatori che erano promossi più di altri.

translation.en: [AO] You see cats.
translation.it: Vedi i ragazzi.

translation.en: They had one or two big games. They are "streetball legends."
translation.it: Hanno fatto una o due partite importanti. Erano "leggende dello streetball".

translation.en: We was grinding like… nine, ten years
translation.it: Noi abbiamo lavorato sodo per nove o dieci anni

translation.en: before we even knew what AND1 was.
translation.it: senza sapere cosa fosse AND1.

translation.en: [Headache] Oh man, don't get me wrong. Professor's a heck of a basketball player,
translation.it: Non fraintendermi. Il professore è un grande giocatore,

translation.en: but, um, I question sometimes his motive.
translation.it: ma a volte metto in dubbio le sue motivazioni.

translation.en: [The Professor] It doesn't really bother me. I mean,
translation.it: Non mi dà fastidio. Cioè,

translation.en: as long as we're out on tour having fun, I really don't care what they think. Honestly.
translation.it: finché siamo in tour a divertirci, non m'importa cosa pensano. Davvero.

translation.en: The rock star started getting into everybody's head.
translation.it: La figura della rock star iniziò a entrare nella testa di tutti.

translation.en: And everybody started thinking about the money.
translation.it: E tutti iniziarono a pensare ai soldi.

translation.en: You… You stop acting like that, man. Damn, man, fuck!
translation.it: Smettila di comportarti così. Accidenti, cazzo!

translation.en: [man] How you figure that?
translation.it: Come l'hai capito?

translation.en: Where you getting the check from?
translation.it: Dove prendi l'assegno?

translation.en: If I wasn't here, I'd be out playing and making money.
translation.it: Se non fossi qui, giocherei e farei soldi.

translation.en: This tour? It's breaking me. I'm not making money.
translation.it: Il tour mi danneggia. Non guadagno.

translation.en: My contract ain't shit, man. I'm telling y'all niggas. It ain't shit, yo! It ain't shit!
translation.it: Il mio contratto non vale un cazzo. Continuo a dirvelo. Un cazzo!

translation.en: I'm eating off this. I'm making plenty of money.
translation.it: Io ci mangio. Ci sto facendo soldi.

translation.en: I don't know about you, man. My living expenses ain't like yours.
translation.it: Non so voi. Io ho uno stile di vita diverso.

translation.en: You live in luxury, nigga. You live in luxury. I'm still living in the projects, nigga!
translation.it: Tu vivi nel lusso. Io vivo ancora nelle case popolari.

translation.en: We got too many all-stars.
translation.it: Abbiamo troppe all-star.

translation.en: When you create a monster,
translation.it: Quando crei un mostro,

translation.en: you gotta know how to tame a monster.
translation.it: devi sapere come domare il mostro.

translation.en: The animosity against each other boiled up to a point
translation.it: L'animosità reciproca crebbe al punto

translation.en: where it was becoming bigger and bigger and bigger.
translation.it: di esplodere.

translation.en: -Why you don't ask me? -'Cause I'm not-- [bleep]
translation.it: - Perché non me lo chiedi? - Perché no.

translation.en: Why not? I ask the coach a question!
translation.it: Perché no? Chiedo al coach!

translation.en: -[man] That's why. -[Hot Sauce] I don't disrespect you.
translation.it: - Ecco. - Non ti manco di rispetto.

translation.en: -[Ziggy] I'm not talking to you! -Eat a dick! Eat a dick, nigga!
translation.it: - Non sto parlando con te! - Succhiamelo!

translation.en: I ain't trying to hear that shit, man!
translation.it: Non provarci, cazzo.

translation.en: -Who's a bitch, Zig? Who? -[Ziggy] You!
translation.it: - Chi è uno stronzo, Zig? Chi? - Tu!

translation.en: [man] Bro, don't get this shit.
translation.it: Non filmare.

translation.en: We look like clowns.
translation.it: Sembriamo clown.

translation.en: That shit's getting crazy.
translation.it: Stiamo esagerando.

translation.en: [man 2] Yo, why y'all grabbing me? Why you grabbing me, though, man?
translation.it: Perché mi afferrate? Perché mi afferri?

translation.en: [Tom] When I took over footwear, we had a phenomenal business success.
translation.it: Con le scarpe iniziò il gran successo commerciale.

translation.en: We were doing 90% of the sales.
translation.it: Facevamo il 90% delle vendite.

translation.en: At that point, I felt like the whole company was on my shoulders to a degree.
translation.it: A quel punto mi sentivo l'intera società sulle spalle.

translation.en: [Jay] So Tom decided to move over to Taiwan
translation.it: Così Tom decise di trasferirsi a Taiwan

translation.en: because he could influence the quality of the product much better
translation.it: perché poteva influenzare la qualità del prodotto molto meglio direttamente dalla fabbrica.

translation.en: sitting there at the factory.
translation.it: molto meglio direttamente dalla fabbrica.

translation.en: I was worried because Tom's an incredibly hard worker.
translation.it: Mi inquietava che Tom lavorasse tanto.

translation.en: I probably worked 364 days a year on average.
translation.it: Lavoravo in media 364 giorni all'anno.

translation.en: I just lived in, like, airports and hotels,
translation.it: Vivevo in aeroporti e hotel,

translation.en: switching 12 time zones every six weeks.
translation.it: cambiando 12 fusi orari ogni sei settimane.

translation.en: Without me realizing it, it became too much.
translation.it: Senza che me ne accorgessi, diventò troppo.

translation.en: Ended up getting diagnosed with a digestive disorder.
translation.it: Alla fine mi fu diagnosticato un disturbo digestivo.

translation.en: I lost like 20 or 30 pounds.
translation.it: Persi 10 o 13 chili.

translation.en: I remember Seth and Jay called me at 2:00, 3:00 in the morning Asian time.
translation.it: Seth e Jay mi chiamarono alle 3 del mattino fuso asiatico.

translation.en: "How's it going? What's next?" And I just lost it.
translation.it: "Come va? E il prossimo passo?" E persi il controllo.

translation.en: "That's it. I am sick of you chirping at me."
translation.it: "Basta. Sono stufo del vostro cinguettio.

translation.en: "I'm doing what I'm doing. You know, you guys can't do this."
translation.it: Faccio il mio lavoro. Voi non ci riuscite."

translation.en: And I hung up.
translation.it: E riattaccai.

translation.en: I know Tom did feel some pressures from outside,
translation.it: Tom sentiva la pressione esterna,

translation.en: and particularly from me as the person to whom he directly reported.
translation.it: specie da me, come persona a cui doveva riferire.

translation.en: I kind of ended up pulling back into my own little shell.
translation.it: Finii per ritirarmi nel mio guscio.

translation.en: I lost friendships during that time.
translation.it: Persi delle amicizie.

translation.en: I just ended up a mess, physically and emotionally.
translation.it: Finii devastato, fisicamente ed emotivamente.

translation.en: For the first time in my life, it wasn't fun.
translation.it: Per la prima volta, non mi divertivo. Non fu mai facile,

translation.en: It wasn't always easy, but it had always been fun.
translation.it: Per la prima volta, non mi divertivo. Non fu mai facile, ma divertente sì.

translation.en: [Seth] So Tom comes into my office.
translation.it: Così Tom venne da me.

translation.en: He says, "Seth, I'm resigning."
translation.it: Disse: "Seth, mi dimetto".

translation.en: I'm like, "Wait. What?" Like, that's impossible.
translation.it: E io: "Aspetta. Cosa?" Non è possibile.

translation.en: [Jay] After Tom left us, we cratered.
translation.it: Dopo l'uscita di Tom, collassammo.

translation.en: We went from over 200 million in sales to, you know, 130. I had to lay off 20% of the staff.
translation.it: Le vendite scesero da 200 a 130 milioni. Dovetti licenziare il 20% dello staff.

translation.en: We knew we only had a small window to sell the company
translation.it: Avevamo una piccola finestra per vendere

translation.en: in order to maximize the financial value.
translation.it: e massimizzare il valore finanziario.

translation.en: [Duke] Paoli, Pennsylvania.
translation.it: Paoli, Pennsylvania.

translation.en: The 2005 minicamp. Mixtape Tour!
translation.it: Il minicamp 2005. Mixtape Tour!

translation.en: [The Professor] I just got word from the people at AND1 that we're to be on the cover of Sports Illustrated.
translation.it: Ho appena saputo da And1. Faremo la copertina di Sports Illustrated.

translation.en: Growing up, to be on Sports Illustrated, it's like the king of sports magazines.
translation.it: Siamo forti, Sports Illustrated è il re delle riviste sportive.

translation.en: It's going down. It's official.
translation.it: Ecco. È ufficiale.

translation.en: Right. We gotta frame this right here.
translation.it: Giusto. Dobbiamo incorniciarlo.

translation.en: [The Professor] Before the beginning of the 2005 tour,
translation.it: Prima dell'inizio del tour del 2005,

translation.en: we didn't get a call right away to renew our contracts. So it was confusing.
translation.it: non ci chiesero il rinnovo dei contratti. Ci confuse.

translation.en: We was just frustrated with the way everything was going on.
translation.it: Eravamo frustrati per come stavano andando le cose.

translation.en: So many stories has been going around.
translation.it: Giravano un sacco di voci.

translation.en: [The Professor] All of a sudden, the staff rounded us up in a room.
translation.it: D'un tratto, lo staff ci radunò in una stanza.

translation.en: So I'm like, "Heck is going on here?" He's like, "Yo, just chill."
translation.it: Dico: "Che cavolo succede?" E lui: "Rilassati".

translation.en: [The Professor] And they told us, "Hey. There's going to be a major buy-out,
translation.it: Ci dissero: "Ci sarà una grossa acquisizione

translation.en: and things aren't gonna be the same."
translation.it: e le cose cambieranno".

translation.en: It was unexpected.
translation.it: Fu inaspettato.

translation.en: It was gone. That was it.
translation.it: Era finita. Andata.

translation.en: No notice. No notice.
translation.it: Nessun preavviso.

translation.en: The players are so prideful
translation.it: I giocatori sono così altezzosi

translation.en: that I don't think they will ever tell you that they felt down.
translation.it: I giocatori sono così altezzosi che non ti diranno mai che si sentirono delusi.

translation.en: At the end of the day, we mint. But I think about the audacity for them
translation.it: Alla fine, tutto ok. Ma penso alla loro audacia.

translation.en: not sitting with none of the legends when that shit ended.
translation.it: Non furono solidali con le leggende quando finì.

translation.en: It should be a success story.
translation.it: Sarebbe una storia lieta.

translation.en: AND1 was huge. We created something from nothing.
translation.it: AND1 era enorme. L'avevamo creata dal nulla.

translation.en: We sold the business, and we all made a lot of money,
translation.it: L'avevamo venduta e avevamo fatto molti soldi,

translation.en: but the sale, in the end, was so hard for me physically,
translation.it: ma la vendita fu molto dura per me fisicamente

translation.en: and then it was also just, like, really sad.
translation.it: e anche molto triste.

translation.en: There was infighting and some fracturing of relationships,
translation.it: Ci furono lotte interne e fratture nei rapporti

translation.en: and emotionally it's still, like, bittersweet.
translation.it: ed emotivamente è ancora una storia agrodolce.

translation.en: Definitely.
translation.it: Decisamente.

translation.en: [announcer] You may recognize his face from ESPN Streetball!
translation.it: Potreste riconoscere la sua faccia da Streetball della ESPN!

translation.en: -Shane "The Dribble Machine" Woney! -[crowd cheering, applauding]
translation.it: Shane "The Dribbling Machine" Woney!

translation.en: Court Jesters is a semi-pro league version of the… of the Harlem Globetrotters.
translation.it: Court Jesters è una versione della lega semi-professionista degli Harlem Globetrotters.

translation.en: This… This ain't like the Garden. Nothing like the Garden, baby.
translation.it: Non è come il Garden. Non ha niente a che fare col Garden.

translation.en: I may see a guy that recognizes me, and they ask me a question like,
translation.it: Magari vedo un tizio che mi riconosce e mi chiede tipo:

translation.en: "What you doing working here, man? You was on TV."
translation.it: "Perché lavori qui? Eri in televisione".

translation.en: That right there is a heartbreaker.
translation.it: È un colpo al cuore.

translation.en: Every day I wake up saying, "Man. I hope something happens
translation.it: Ogni giorno mi sveglio sperando succeda qualcosa

translation.en: where they say, 'You know what? Shane, we need you just for today.'"
translation.it: in cui dicono: "Shane, ci servi per un giorno".

translation.en: This is what I think.
translation.it: Ecco cosa penso.

translation.en: We didn't get paid what we was worth.
translation.it: Non ci pagarono per quanto valevamo.

translation.en: How about that? How about that? Our worth.
translation.it: Che ne dici? Il nostro valore.

translation.en: They came to the hood and took everything.
translation.it: Saccheggiarono il ghetto.

translation.en: The hood gives them their opinions or whatever, "Y'all should do this."
translation.it: Il ghetto gli dà il diritto di fare cosa vogliono.

translation.en: They run right upstairs and do it,
translation.it: Si prendono ciò che vogliono,

translation.en: and then they sell it and don't give nothing back.
translation.it: lo vendono e non danno niente in cambio.

translation.en: Like I always said. It's called "Poverty Pimping."
translation.it: Si chiama "Sfruttamento della povertà".

translation.en: People say, "Well, corporate America is trying to take advantage of you and make money."
translation.it: La gente dice: "Le aziende americane ti sfruttano per fare soldi".

translation.en: That's what the outside world perceives, and being on the inside, that wasn't the case.
translation.it: Questo è ciò che percepisce il mondo esterno, ma non era così.

translation.en: We were trying to catch lightning in a bottle and do something cool.
translation.it: Cercammo il colpo di fortuna facendo qualcosa di bello.

translation.en: If we're guilty of anything, it was that.
translation.it: Quella fu la nostra unica colpa.

translation.en: The contracts that we signed with them weren't insignificant.
translation.it: I contratti firmati con loro non erano insignificanti.

translation.en: We paid some of the Mixtape players more than we paid other NBA players.
translation.it: Alcuni giocatori dei Mixtape presero più di altri dell'NBA.

translation.en: They signed us to a contract,
translation.it: Ci proposero un contratto

translation.en: now it's up to us to agree to that number.
translation.it: e stava a noi accettare la cifra.

translation.en: We don't have to agree to that number.
translation.it: Non eravamo costretti.

translation.en: The money they offered me? Heck yeah, I'm gonna take it.
translation.it: I soldi che mi offrirono? Cavolo, li prendiamo.

translation.en: I don't care what y'all got to say about it.
translation.it: Non m'importa cosa dite.

translation.en: "Oh, you're not loyal. Shit is…" Loyal to what?
translation.it: "Non sei leale." Leale verso cosa?

translation.en: That loyalty ain't gonna give me no check. I know that.
translation.it: Quella lealtà non mi darà alcun assegno. Lo so.

translation.en: Did they love us for what we did? Yeah.
translation.it: Ci hanno amati per quello che abbiamo fatto? Sì.

translation.en: But did they respect us?
translation.it: Ma ci rispettavano?

translation.en: Answer me that.
translation.it: Rispondimi.

translation.en: [Jay] One of my biggest regrets.
translation.it: Un mio grande rimpianto.

translation.en: Had we thought of the Mixtape players like employees
translation.it: Se avessimo pensato ai nostri giocatori come dipendenti e non come atleti sponsorizzati,

translation.en: as opposed to endorsed athletes,

translation.en: then we could have given them some stock options.

translation.en: And that would have resulted in some incremental wealth

translation.en: going to all those players.

translation.en: -I think it's a-- I think it's a… -Our lives didn't matter, man.
translation.it: - Credo che… - Le nostre vite non contavano.

translation.en: -Main. Our lives… My man… -Maybe.
translation.it: - Main. Non contavano. - Forse.

translation.en: I… Listen, listen, listen.

translation.en: My last final year with AND1,
translation.it: Nel mio ultimo anno con AND1,

translation.en: I asked that man for $16,000 to put my son in school for a contract,
translation.it: chiesi a quell'uomo 16.000 dollari nel contratto per mandare mio figlio a scuola

translation.en: and then they told me, "I cannot help you."

translation.en: After all that shit we did.
translation.it: Dopo tutto quello che avevamo fatto.

translation.en: I… I don't remember it.

translation.en: I'm sad that I don't remember it.

translation.en: It is possible Shane spoke directly to me,

translation.en: um, and if… and if that's the case and we were not able to take care of him and his kid, I feel terrible.

translation.en: but the money will never, ever supersede the experience.
